data.eml:eml: New species of Lebiasina (Ostariophysi: Characiformes: Lebiasinidae) from the upper Mazaruni River drainage, Guyana

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Netto-Ferreira, André L., Lopez-Fernandez, Hernán, Taphorn, Donald C., Liverpool, Elford A. (2013): New species of Lebiasina (Ostariophysi: Characiformes: Lebiasinidae) from the upper Mazaruni River drainage, Guyana. Zootaxa 3652 (5): 562-568, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.223031
